channel.title: Hugo on Paran.Blue
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Paran.Blue

item.title: Hugo :: Quick Start
item.description: Create a Hugo site using the beautiful Ananke theme. This quick start uses macOS in the examples. For instructions about how to install Hugo on other operating systems, see install. It is recommended to have Git installed to run this tutorial. For other approaches learning Hugo like book or a video tutorial refer to the external learning resources page. Step 1: Install Hugo Homebrew and MacPorts, package managers for macOS, can be installed from brew.
